source: IRS Publication; One Big Beautiful Bill Act (signed July 4, 2025); IRS Schedule 8812 Instructions

child_tax_credit.notes: CTC increased from $2,000 to $2,200 per child by One Big Beautiful Bill Act. Credit reduced by 5% of AGI exceeding threshold. ACTC requires minimum earned income of $2,500.

credit_for_other_dependents.notes: Non-refundable credit for dependents who do not qualify for CTC (e.g., children 17+, qualifying relatives). Same phase-out thresholds as CTC.

earned_income_tax_credit.notes: Only the maximum for 3+ qualifying children ($8,046) was explicitly stated in IRS sources reviewed. Other amounts require IRS Publication 596 or EITC tables.

notes: Non-refundable credits reduce tax liability to zero but no further. Refundable credits (ACTC, EITC) can result in a refund. Personal exemption remains $0 for 2025 (suspended through 2025 by TCJA, now permanently eliminated by OBBBA).
